item.title: MongoDB Modeling Pattern
item.description: 요약 reference - []https://www.mongodb.com/blog/post/building-with-patterns-a-summary Appproximation pattern Attribute pattern Bucket pattern Computed pattern Document Versioning pattern Extended Reference pattern Outlier pattern Pre-allocated pattern Polymorphic pattern Schema Versioning pattern Subset pattern Tree and Graph pattern Appproximation pattern reference - https://www.mongodb.com/blog/post/building-with-patterns-the-approximation-pattern Attribute pattern reference - https://www.mongodb.com/blog/post/building-with-patterns-the-attribute-pattern Bucket pattern reference - https://www.mongodb.com/blog/post/building-with-patterns-the-bucket-pattern Computed pattern reference - https://www.mongodb.com/blog/post/building-with-patterns-the-computed-pattern Document Versioning pattern reference - https://www.mongodb.com/blog/post/building-with-patterns-the-document-versioning-pattern Extended Reference pattern reference - https://www.mongodb.com/blog/post/building-with-patterns-the-extended-reference-pattern Outlier pattern reference - https://www.mongodb.com/blog/post/building-with-patterns-the-outlier-pattern
